unnormalised: Crop insurance, huh? Good for farmers like Ramu kaka in our village near Nagpur. Heard it helped him after that crazy hailstorm last year. Onam sadhya would've been scarce without it! Wish the premium wasn't so high though. Maybe the govt. can subsidize it more, especially for marginal farmers. What about including fruits like mangoes? Just a thought!
normalised: Crop insurance, huh? Good for farmers like Ramu kaka in our village near Nagpur. Heard it helped him after that crazy hailstorm last year. Onam sadhya would have been scarce without it! Wish the premium was not so high though. Maybe the government can subsidize it more, especially for marginal farmers. What about including fruits like mangoes? Just a thought!
